content:
An Attack on Titan figurine collection deserves a fitting display case! I've got some great recommendations for you:

**Display Cases with Locks for 10-15 Figurines:**

1. **IKEA Detolf Display Case**: A popular and affordable option that can hold 10-15 figurines, depending on their size. It has a lockable door and a compact design. (around $40)
2. **Umbra Trigg Vase Display Case**: A modern, sleek case with three shelves and a locking door. It's perfect for showcasing smaller figurines and can hold around 10-12 Attack on Titan figurines. (around $50)
3. **DisplayIt! Locking Display Case**: A high-quality, wall-mounted case with a locking door and adjustable shelves. It can hold around 12-15 figurines and has a compact design. (around $60)
4. **BCW Acrylic Display Case**: A clear acrylic case with a locking door and three shelves. It's perfect for showcasing your Attack on Titan figurines and can hold around 10-12 figures. (around $70)
5. **Glass Display Case by DisplayMax**: A high-end, wall-mounted case with a locking door and adjustable shelves. It can hold around 12-15 figurines and has a sleek, modern design. (around $100)

**Features to Consider:**

1. **Locking mechanism**: Ensure the case has a secure locking system to keep your figurines dust-free and protected.
2. **Adjustable shelves**: Look for cases with adjustable shelves to accommodate figurines of different sizes.
3. **Acrylic or glass construction**: These materials will provide a clear view of your figurines and help protect them from dust.
4. **Compact design**: Consider a case with a compact design to save space and fit more figurines.
5. **Wall-mountable**: If you want to save floor space, look for cases that can be mounted on a wall.

**Tips for Displaying Your Attack on Titan Figurines:**

1. **Group similar figurines together**: Display your Attack on Titan figurines by character, series, or theme to create a visually appealing display.
2. **Create a background**: Use a background or diorama to add context and depth to your display.
3. **Use risers or stands**: Consider using risers or stands to create a multi-level display and add visual interest.
4. **Keep it clean and dust-free**: Regularly clean your display case and figurines to keep them looking their best.

Remember to measure your space and consider the size of your figurines before making a purchase. Happy displaying!
